pages.text: The Transmutation Altar has had a few recipes added to it that enable you to convert between the most common types of ingots, almost like Equivalent Exchange. However, these transmutations take a long time, and dump a small but notable amount of chaos into the world.

In addition to ingots, you can also transmute between Gems with different Slime Crystal catalysts.$(br2)$(italics)This is a normal feature of SilentsGems, but has been tweaked to use the gems in the recipes instead of the ores.$()$(br2)Silent's Gems adds Spawn Egg recipes to the Altar. Additional recipes for modded Spawn Eggs have been added.
